sentence.Network_en: Somewhat ingenuously, he explains how the crime may be accomplished.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有点天真地解释了这一罪行可能是如何实施的。

sentence.Network_en: "She seems at times an accomplished liar," he said.
He felt a glow of pride in what she had accomplished.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为她取得的成绩深感自豪。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... accomplice n. 从犯 accomplished adj. 熟练的；完成的 accredit v. 归功于.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... accomplice n. 从犯 accomplished adj. 熟练的；完成的 accredit v. 归功于.
12个字母的英文单词有哪些_百度知道 ... accidentally 偶然地 accomplished 完成了的；熟练的 affectionate 亲切的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... accomplish v 成就；完成 accomplished a 有成就的，有造诣的 compliment v 赞扬，恭维.

list.abs: ...Steve Ballmer)站在横幅前，上面写着“任务完成（Mission Accomplished）”。
七月十四日白色羽扇豆（White Lupin） 多才多艺（highly accomplished）（Highly Accomplished）七月十五日金盏花（Marigold） 一丝不苟 （Exact Man）  …
15.《人类成就》（Human Accomplishment）作者：查尔斯·默里有争议的《钟形曲线》一书合著者对知识的历史发表独特见解。
fact的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n. 真情调查, 调停 accomplished fact 既成事实 after the fact 【律】犯罪之后.

means.word_mean: 天才的,熟能生巧的,有效的
高雅的,有修养的,高尚的

entry.tran: 熟练的;才华高的;有造诣的
entry.def: If someone is accomplished at something, they are very good at it.

example.tran: 她是位颇有建树的画家。

example.ex: ...one of the most accomplished composers of our time.
example.tran: 我们这个时代最杰出的作曲家之一

means.word_mean: 2. successfully completed or brought to an end;

sentences.sentence: "his mission accomplished he took a vacation"
"the joy of a realized ambition overcame him"
"that smoking causes health problems is an accomplished fact"

auth_sentence.content: It's an elegant end to an accomplished work.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's an elegant end to an accomplished work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's an elegant end to an accomplished work.

auth_sentence.content: No matter; this is arresting and accomplished music.
auth_sentence.res_content: No matter; this is arresting and accomplished music.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No matter; this is arresting and accomplished music.

auth_sentence.content: There's some accomplished support from the sidemen too.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯; 4. =full/fill,表示"满,填满"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 详述的,明确的;坦率的;显然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pli重叠+cit→把重叠的东西弄出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 简单的, 简易的, 朴素的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sim一次+ple=pli重叠,重复→折一次→简单

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有成就的,有才艺的;有造诣的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accomplish[v.完成]+ed……的→完成了的→有成就的
com全部+pli满,填满+ment表名词→让人十分满足
com全部+pli满,填满+ment表名词→让人十分满足
sim一次+pli折叠+ify表动词→折叠一次→简单化
ac加强+com全部+pli满+sh→全部弄满→完成

Sentence.sentence: It can only be partly accomplished now.

Nonetheless, the developers of the Chinatown garage are confident with the technology and are counting on it to squeeze 67 cars in an apartment-building basement that would otherwise fit only 24, accomplished by removing a maneuver space normally required.
His talent as an accomplished musician
And he was an accomplished musician.

means.word_mean: 完成了的；实现了的；竣工的

sentences.en: All these plans were accomplished in a year.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些计划在一年内完成了。

means.word_mean: 聪明的;有才艺的, 娴熟的

sentences.en: She was an elegant and accomplished woman.
Mission accomplished. Let’s go and have a drink.
sentences.cn: 任务完成了，咱们去喝一杯吧。
他是个有造诣的音乐家。
